subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Much has been made of how Ken Whisenhunt, the coach of the Arizona Cardinals, used to be an assistant with the Pittsburgh Steelers. That familiarity will play a big role in game strategy.
snippet: Much has been made of how Ken Whisenhunt, the coach of the Arizona Cardinals, used to be an assistant with the Pittsburgh Steelers. That familiarity will play a big role in game strategy.
